summary: Add a Feedback section under Contact that embeds a provided Google Form in a card-style layout.
architectural_notes: Feedback will be shown under the existing Contact section and will embed an external Google Form (card-style embed).

existing_features.title: Update the Contact page so that the existing "Feedback" card embeds the provided Google Form directly inside the card (iframe embed), instead of only offering a button/link to open it in a new tab.
Centralize the embedded-form URL derivation in the existing feedback form utility so the Contact page embed stays consistent with the already-shared Google Form constant.

new_feature_requests.summary: Embed the provided Google Form as a card-style Feedback section under the Contact area (not a separate page, not a button).

projectName: Embed Google Form inside Contact > Feedback card
